page.title: 08The Baptist Chapel
page.content: The Baptist Fellowship in Breachwood Green began in 1825 at Colemans Green House.Later a Church was built in 1831 and this was replaced with the present building in 1904. Every Sunday I go to Chapel and my Dad reads the notices. We have Sunday School and once every month we stay in Church for the Family Service. After Sunday School my mum sets out all the chairs for the Ladies Fellowship on Wednesday afternoons. On Thursday mornings a coffee club is held for young mums. David Farr In the Baptist chapel there is a pulpit that was used by John BUNYAN when he was preaching in this area. There is also a Breeches Bible. It is called a Breeches Bible because it says in Genesis that Adam and Eve made themselves breeches. Donna. Louise.
